title: The Rain forest
creator_credit: Education Media Australia, David Corke and Bruce Amos
brief_description: Filmed in the McPherson Ranges in southern Queensland, capturing the watery atmosphere, eerie sounds, fragile plants and delicate patterns of light which penetrate the dense foliage. The main highlight is a vast camp of flying foxes hanging from the palms, fanning themselves with extended wing membrane.
